name: Towers of England
description:
Collect six colour towers. Blue, green, red etc towers. Each has 7 bricks of different size.

All bricks are shuffled. Solve puzzle by moving bricks. There are two rules to moving.

Rule 1. You can move any brick to empty column.
Rule 2. You can move small brick to large brick of same color.

That's all, folks.

Daily Cup is brilliant part of this amazing game. I won it 72 times during last 6 years.
